column4: guys i hate this! i need to configure my network connection. anytime i type website, it takes time to load.
and it responds back with unknown host
i have two network devices. one is wired connected to my router. but it doesnt work fine. browser dont get google.com
Other than your movie being great . . . can you ping the gateway?
how can i ping the gateway
going into your network utility (System > Admin > Network Tools) and choose the tab "Ping"
using your wired connection, type in -- 192.168.0.1
What happens?  It shouldn't take THAT long.
Okay, it couldn't ping the gateway, which usually means your router isn't configured correctly.  Your signal isn't getting to the internet, because your computer can't even talk to your router.
